sessions.head: current
sessions.notes: Golden test captured existing abort-only option 3, failing test asserted rejection guidance should become a user message. Added instructions field to ToolConfirmationResponse, prompted for feedback in ToolUI, and routed guidance via create_user_message so the agent receives corrective direction.

sessions.head: current
sessions.notes: Release pipeline fix: renamed publish workflow to publish-release.yml, added memory anchor, synced docs, and pinned Python 3.12 so Hatch test runs avoid the 3.13 --filter sentinel bug.

sessions.head: current
sessions.notes: Pytest run failed on Python 3.10 because tomllib is 3.11+. Added tomli fallback import in new characterization test to restore compatibility.
